replies.user_bank_ask_fraud: I'd like to submit a fraud report.
replies.ask_name: Could I get your full name, please?
replies.bank_ask_account_number: Can you tell me your account number, please?
replies.bank_ask_pin: Right, and your PIN as well please.
replies.bank_ask_fraud_details: Could you provide a detailed fraud report now, please?
replies.db_bank_inform_cannot_authenticate: [RESULT] APIName = bank_fraud_report ; Message = You must provide either AccountNumber/FullName/PIN or FullName/DateOfBirth/SecurityAnswer1/SecurityAnswer2. We cannot authenticate the user otherwise. ;
replies.bank_inform_cannot_authenticate: I am sorry, but I cannot authenticate you with the information you have provided.
replies.db_bank_inform_fraud_report_submitted: [RESULT] APIName = bank_fraud_report ; Confirmation = Fraud report submitted successfully. ;
replies.bank_inform_fraud_report_submitted:
Your report has been successfully submitted.
We will have a look at the matter ASAP and will contact you with details in due course.
replies.user_bank_forgot_account_number: I don't know my account number
replies.bank_ask_dob: Could you provide your date of birth, please?
replies.bank_ask_mothers_maiden_name: What was your mother's maiden name?
replies.bank_ask_childhood_pets_name: And what was the name of the pet you had as a child?
replies.user_bank_forgot_dob: I don't know my date of birth
replies.user_bank_forgot_mothers_maiden_name: I don't know my mother's maiden name
replies.user_bank_forgot_childhood_pets_name: I don't know the name of my childhood pet
replies.anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
replies.user_bank_nothing_else: No, I don't need anything else. / that's all.
